exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="UpArrowSkin" width="180" height="180" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="up" source="up0_png"/>
	<e:Image id="down" source="up1_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RightArrowSkin" width="180" height="180" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="up" source="right0_png"/>
	<e:Image id="down" source="right1_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LeftArrowSkin" width="180" height="180" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="up" source="left0_png"/>
	<e:Image id="down" source="left1_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1136" fillColor="0x6FEAEA"/>
	<e:Group id="arrowGroup" height="744" width="640" bottom="0">
		<ns1:SimpleButton id="upBtn" y="331" skinName="UpArrowSkin" x="230"/>
		<ns1:SimpleButton id="rightBtn" y="492" x="372" skinName="RightArrowSkin"/>
		<ns1:SimpleButton id="leftBtn" x="82" y="492" skinName="LeftArrowSkin"/>
		<e:Image source="panel_png" y="96" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label text="重力感应不好使？可以试试点击操作！" y="153" textColor="0x030000" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="322" height="102" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Rect fillColor="0xF5FAFA" width="550" y="24" height="232" horizontalCenter="0" x="10"/>
	<e:Image source="head0_png" y="78" x="80" id="headImg"/>
	<e:Label y="76" textColor="0x030000" text="您当前使用的角色是：" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="326" height="42" x="232" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" y="126" textColor="0xF90101" text="悠悠熊猫" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="center" width="148" height="42" x="220" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	<e:Label id="centerLabel" text="标签" x="50" y="284" width="532" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0x030000"/>
	<e:Label id="deviceLabel" y="334" textColor="0x030000" text="标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="532" x="49" height="76"/>
	<e:Label id="actionLabel" y="421" textColor="0x030000" text="标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="532" x="49"/>
	<e:Label id="statusLabel" y="461" textColor="0x030000" text="标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="532" x="49"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LockSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1136" fillColor="0x6FEAEA"/>
	<e:Rect width="550" height="232" y="178" fillColor="0xF5FAFA" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="headImg" source="head0_png" x="70" y="228"/>
	<e:Label text="我是" x="222" y="226" textColor="0x030000" width="68" height="42" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Label y="266" textColor="0x030000" text="根据大屏幕提示，完成校准，一起游戏吧！" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="350" height="128" x="222"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" y="226" text="悠悠熊猫" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="148" height="42" x="290" textAlign="center" textColor="0xF90101"/>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="校准完成请等待游戏开始" width="410" textColor="0x030000" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" height="110" x="115" bottom="104"/>
	<e:Button id="okBtn" x="221" bottom="204">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ok_png" source.down="ok2_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" fillColor="0x6FEAEA"/>
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="标签" textColor="0x020000" size="30" width="424" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" height="68" x="108" bottom="283"/>
	<e:Image source="preload_foot_png" bottom="-60"/>
	<e:Image source="preload_logo_png" x="68" bottom="334"/>
	<e:Image source="preload_title_png" width="516" height="150" y="40" x="62"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PrizeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1136" fillColor="0x6FEAEA"/>
	<e:Image source="result_prizetitle_png" y="60" x="162"/>
	<e:Image source="result_prizebg_png" y="266" x="185"/>
	<e:Image source="result_bag0_png" y="381" rotation="30" x="467" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image source="result_bag0_png" y="437" scaleX="0.8" rotation="-30" scaleY="0.8" x="90"/>
	<e:Image source="result_bag0_png" x="365" y="340" rotation="15"/>
	<e:Image source="result_bag0_png" y="377" rotation="-15" x="154"/>
	<e:Image source="result_bag1_png" y="299" x="217"/>
	<e:Image source="result_textbg_png" y="612" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="okBtn" source="result_okbtn_png" y="760" x="220"/>
	<e:EditableText id="phoneLabel" width="380" height="48" x="131" y="617" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="30" textColor="0x010000" verticalAlign="middle" text="19999"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultHeadSkin" width="130" height="150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="imgGroup" height="75" width="75" y="0" x="23"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="AAAAA" y="79" width="126" size="16" textColor="0x060000" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" height="35" x="2"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="117" textColor="0x060000" size="16" text="得分：99" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="127" verticalAlign="middle" height="17" x="2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RankHeadSkin" width="300" height="90" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="rankbg0_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="imgGroup" height="50" width="50" x="59" y="23"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="rankLabel" x="21" y="28" font="rankFont_fnt" text="1"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="标签" x="114" y="26" width="180" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" size="20" textAlign="left" textColor="0x040000"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" y="53" textColor="0x040000" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="101" size="20" text="标签" x="188"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1136" fillColor="0x6FEAEA"/>
	<e:Group id="resultGroup" height="1136" width="640">
		<e:Image source="result_title_png" y="20" x="104"/>
		<e:Image source="result_no1_png" y="115" x="245"/>
		<e:Image source="result_no2_png" x="46" y="156"/>
		<e:Image source="result_no3_png" x="434" y="164" height="214"/>
		<ns1:ResultHead id="head0" x="259" y="222" width="120" height="110" skinName="ResultHeadSkin"/>
		<ns1:ResultHead x="61" width="120" y="227" height="110" id="head1" skinName="ResultHeadSkin"/>
		<ns1:ResultHead id="head2" width="120" y="231" height="110" x="449" skinName="ResultHeadSkin"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="rankGroup" height="1136" width="640">
		<e:Image source="rankbg1_png" y="428" x="11"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rank0" x="20" y="480" skinName="RankHeadSkin"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="20" y="565" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rank1"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rank2" y="650" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="20"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="20" y="735" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rank3"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rank4" y="820" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="20"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="323" y="480" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rank5"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rank6" y="565" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="323"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="323" y="650" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rank7"/>
		<ns1:RankHead id="rank8" y="735" skinName="RankHeadSkin" x="323"/>
		<ns1:RankHead x="323" y="820" skinName="RankHeadSkin" id="rank9"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="result_again_png" x="112" bottom="35"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MessageBoxSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image source="messageBoxBg_png" x="48" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="closeBtn_png" x="525" verticalCenter="-164.5"/>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="请求失败" width="358" height="189" textColor="0x1E2329" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="30" x="141" top="474" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
</e:Skin>
